aboutTextPresentation: My name is Victor, and I am a web development specialist working as a freelance developer. Additionally, I work professionally as a Business Intelligence Analyst at a company, combining technology and strategy to drive results.
aboutTextSecondParagraph: My expertise lies in Front-end development with React, always focusing on performance, UX/UI, and innovative web solutions.
experienceItem1Description: Technical and accounting support in the accounting systems group and writing code in SQL.
experienceItem2Description: Web development with PHP, Vue.js, Javascript, and PostgreSQL.
experienceItem3Description: Marketplace development with React and Node.js.
experienceItem4Description: Data analysis and strategies to optimize decisions and business results.
experienceItem5Description: Website development, landing pages, UX, and UI.
